title: Forest Gnome
content:
ts.

BG3 Full Game Note: In the full launch of Baldur's Gate 3, Ability Score Points for Races that were present in Early Access are removed. And instead, Ability Score Points in the full game correspond with the Class players will choose.

Even smaller than their cousins and twice as reclusive, forest gnomes are a rare sight in Faer√ªn. They master magic and craftsmanship in their distant, idyllic groves.

Forest Gnome Traits:

Darkvision: Can see in the dark up to 12 m. Spell: Speak with Animal
